ai-ja287:2.1_0: “A curse it is the obtaining of fame,
ai-ja287:2.2_0: And the obtaining of wealth, brahmin;
ai-ja287:2.3_0: These things come with a low rebirth,
ai-ja287:3.1_0: Those who have attained it himself
ai-ja287:3.2_0: and have gone forth from home to homelessness.
ai-ja287:3.3_0: It is better for the Ājīvakas;
